Name: Aquaponics Aquarium
Description: An Aquarium with inlets and outlets designed to work in Aquaponics systems. Creates Fertilizer with a chance to produce either Roe or Quality Fertilizer

DescriptionLocalization.es: An Aquarium with inlets and outlets designed to work in Aquaponics systems. Applies Fertlizer to nearby Hydroponics Beds while producing Roe.
